LanguageData.VFEPD_DataConsole.description: An advanced data console accepting several different types of file formatting.

LanguageData.VFEPD_DataConveyor.description: A large box holding cables and pipes for data transfer.

LanguageData.VFEPD_DisplayTable.description: A large size display screen mounted on a large table.

LanguageData.VFEPD_LongCommandConsole.description: A long console with several different command modules.
LanguageData.VFEPD_PlanningScreen.label: planning screen
LanguageData.VFEPD_PlanningScreen.description: A glass screen, ideal for planning out combat scenarios.
LanguageData.VFEPD_PlanningTable.label: planning table
LanguageData.VFEPD_PlanningTable.description: A large size planning screen mounted on a large table.
LanguageData.VFEPD_TripleDisplay.label: triple display dashboard
LanguageData.VFEPD_TripleDisplay.description: A large dashboard with several display screens, for up-to-date information on all mod releases.

LanguageData.VFEPD_SpacerContainer.description: A medium sized, triple sealed, password protected box.

LanguageData.VFEPD_SpacerContainerStack.description: A large stack of different sized, triple sealed, password protected boxes.
LanguageData.VFEPD_SpacerStorage.label: advanced storage device
LanguageData.VFEPD_SpacerStorage.description: A large, multi-chamber advanced storage device.
LanguageData.VFEPD_SwitchPanel.label: switch panel
LanguageData.VFEPD_SwitchPanel.description: A medium sized panel containing varius levers and switches.
LanguageData.VFEPD_ServerRack.label: server rack
LanguageData.VFEPD_ServerRack.description: A large server rack, containing multiple hard drives and advanced computer components.
LanguageData.VFEPD_SensorPlatform.label: sensor platform
LanguageData.VFEPD_SensorPlatform.description: A small platform containing a variety of sensors.
LanguageData.VFEPD_PersonalConsole.label: personal console
